title.text: Internet Explorer 8 for Windows Server 2008 x64 Edition

description.text: Internet Explorer 8 is the latest version of the familiar Web browser that you are most comfortable using.  Internet Explorer 8 helps you get everything that you want from the Web faster, easier, and more privately and securely than ever.  After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer. This update is provided to you and licensed under the Windows Vista License Terms.
